Studio

Flowers as a language of luxury.

Flower Bunny is the studio of Melody Liu — a bespoke floral atelier working at the intersection of art direction, craft, and the natural world.

Each commission is treated as a singular work: conceived with intention, executed with precision, and designed to command the room — whether that room is a couture runway, a flagship window, or a private dining table set for forty.

Services

What we create

01

Brand Activations

Florals that launch a moment into memory.

From product launches to immersive pop-ups, we create botanical environments that amplify your brand's aesthetic and generate genuine spectacle. Every detail — scale, scent, texture — is calibrated to your identity.

Launch EventsPop-Up EnvironmentsBrand Identity
02

Window Displays

The art of the first impression.

Retail windows are a canvas. We design seasonal and bespoke window installations for luxury flagships and boutiques — installations that stop pedestrians, drive footfall, and become their own editorial moment.

Seasonal WindowsFlagship RetailVisual Merchandising
03

Fashion Events

Runways grown from the earth.

Fashion shows demand environments as considered as the clothes themselves. We collaborate with designers and creative directors on catwalk backdrops, set design, and full venue transformation — turning a space into a world.

Runway DesignShow SetsCreative Direction
04

Private Commissions

Extraordinary moments deserve an extraordinary table.

Intimate dinners, milestone celebrations, and private residences — we bring the same rigour and artistry to personal spaces that we apply to the world's most prestigious brands. No commission is too considered.

Private DiningCelebrationsResidences
8+
Years creating for the world's most discerning clients
About

Melody Liu

Founder & Creative Director

Flower Bunny was born from a conviction that florals are not decoration — they are architecture. Melody Liu founded the studio after a decade working at the intersection of art, fashion, and spatial design, developing a language that is simultaneously lush and disciplined.

She has collaborated with fashion houses, gallery institutions, and private collectors across London, Paris, and New York — bringing the same obsessive attention to a 40-person dinner as to a flagship launch attended by thousands.

Her work has been featured in Vogue, Wallpaper*, and AnOther Magazine.

"I want every room to feel like something has grown there — not placed, but summoned."

— Melody Liu
The Approach

How we work

I

Discovery

We begin with a deep conversation — your vision, the space, the feeling you want to leave behind. Nothing is assumed.

II

Concept

From mood to material, we develop a visual proposal: references, botanical selections, colour palettes, and spatial sketches.

III

Craft

Each element is sourced, tested, and perfected. We work only with growers and suppliers who share our standard for quality.

IV

Installation

The studio team installs on-site with precision. Every stem, every wire, every shadow is considered until the work is complete.

Commission

Begin a conversation.

Every project begins with an enquiry. Tell us about your vision — the grander or more specific, the better. We typically respond within 48 hours and schedule a call to explore the project in depth.
